ch0651_78_nanase/0101_0701_01_10:
You came, you came! I’ve been waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0651_78_nanase/0101_0701_02_10:
All right, let’s go check out more famous
spots around Pasio today!
ch0651_78_nanase/7101_0701_01_10: I still can’t believe Pasio is an artificial island!
ch0651_78_nanase/7101_0701_02_10:
Although Pasio and Aether Paradise in Alola are
both artificial islands, they’re completely different.
ch0651_78_nanase/7105_0701_01_10:
You really are great at Pokémon battles,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0651_78_nanase/7105_0701_02_10: I know! You should coach me!
ch0651_78_nanase/7105_0701_03_10:
With you teaching me, I’m sure to grow as
a Trainer!
ch0651_78_nanase/1701_0701_02_10: Here you go! I want you to have this!
ch0651_78_nanase/1701_0702_01_10: It’s a present from me! Please try it out!
ch0651_78_nanase/2501_0701_01_10:
Besides Pasio, I’ve been sight-seeing in lots of
other places!
ch0651_78_nanase/2501_0701_02_10:
My photos folder is full of memories from
my travels!
ch0651_78_nanase/2501_0701_03_10:
Aw, looking at these photos makes me wanna visit
all those places again!
ch0651_78_nanase/2501_0702_01_10:
Every region was so much fun! My cruise on the
S.S. Anne was so beautiful...
ch0651_78_nanase/2501_0702_02_10:
The Pokémon hot springs in Hoenn really were an
excellent place to relax!
ch0651_78_nanase/2501_0702_03_10:
The theme parks in Nimbasa City were great
too, but vacationing in Alola was the best!
ch0651_78_nanase/2501_0702_04_10:
So, where have you traveled? What was your
favorite spot?
ch0651_78_nanase/3001_0701_01_10:
Mornin’! Hmm, I just can’t decide where I’m gonna
go sight-seeing today!
ch0651_78_nanase/3003_0701_01_10:
My day’s just getting started. I’m gonna keep
touring the island until I’m exhausted!
ch0651_78_nanase/3005_0701_01_10:
The night views on Pasio are so nice! I’ve been to
lots of places before, but this is something else!
